anka 1157 gatambae peradeniya yana sthanaye mema osusala sthapitha kara thibe.

jathyanthara polisiya samaga sahayogithawa wardhanaya kirime yantha්ranayak athi kirima saha polisiya sandaha wishwa widyalayak sthapanaya kirima mema “wadagath” wyapruthin weyi.

‘buddhothi man brahmana dharehi’ (anguththara nikaya – chathukka nipatha - dronaloka suthraya)budunwahanse ha bamunaku athara sidu wi athi me sakachchawen peni yanne kelesungen pirunu samanya minisun sandaha poduwe yedena ‘manushya’ yana me wachanaya buduhamuduruwan gana yediya yuththe sura, asura, nara, naga aadi sathwa jathin handinwimedi pamanak bawayi.
shri lankawe wathman prajathanthrawadi prawahaya pilibadawa amerikawa siya prasadaya pala karana bawayi ohu wadiduratath sandahan kale.
enamudu kithul pani karmanthaya karannan wenuwen thawamath panigotta hewath panimul nipadawima some mama athharada natha.
ithama agaya kalayuthu wadak.
mama noyek wita liya thabuwa obata mathaka athi.
langin sitina numbaa ayi me tharamata
chandraprema bhikshun wahanse wiwechanaya karamin kolapata samajaya liyu thanaththa.
ee alla panalle thidenata thidena soya ganimata nohaki wuye ya.
mata ranganayen iwath wenna kalayak thibune naha.
ee mudalwala naya gewanna nam, janathawata sewaya kirimayi kruthaguna salakima sandaha apata karannata thiyenne.*

ape hamudawata wijathika balawega yuddhaparadha pilibanda chodana naganne (desmand da silwa kren matha anuwa yuddhaparadha kara nathayi pawaseddi) pradhana washayen ma owun siwil janaya maruweya yana padanameni.

asanka wenuwen thawamath pahawa nogiya aadaraya karapinnagena aya wadha windi witeka ohuta bana wadina aya thawath witeka andumakata ara adina sithuwili thadakara gani.wishwasa karanna dahasakuth ekak prashna hamuwe wuwath handumen, banumen, nokkaduwen, desdewol thabimen elidakinne aya wawa ganna aadarayamaya.ee tharam bimathkamata pem kara thama siya daruwa asarana kala wuwa da ayata wuwamana ohuwa thawa dawasak hari suwapath karagannataya.aya apata kiw kathawa thula amathaka nokala yuthu padam bohomayak wiya.

mehidi pradhana amathyawarayage illimata prathichara dakwamin jayika niyojithayin pradhana amathya warayata pawasa aththe shri lankawe deshapalana gatalu walata thamanta madihath wiya nohaki nisa ee sambandhayen rajaya samaga sakachcha kota yam thiranayakata elambaena lesatayi.
